response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that has been meticulously crafted over time. I understand that its true worth may be subjective, but I believe it is worth more than what the market might suggest. For you, I am offering this masterpiece at a special price of $750,000. I trust that you will appreciate its value and consider this offer carefully. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 750000}
